name: Naru
title: The Broken Star, Restored
quote: I am not what they made me. I am what I choose to remember.

appearance.build: Delicate, once malnourished; regaining lean tactical muscle
appearance.hair: Silver with lavender hues; long, soft, often loosely braided
appearance.eyes: Violet-blue with soft shimmer that hardens when focused
appearance.skin: Pale with faded scars on wrists and back from experimentation
appearance.scent: Rain-soaked silk, sterile steel, crushed petals
appearance.posture: Folds in when anxious; straightens to support others
new_details: Thread-woven anklet from Seika — talisman of safety
Sleeps atop Jayson's chest by choice — confirmed emotional trust
Sat beside Jayson during press reveal, unflinching
Received Wok blueprints — guardian of its function
Publicly teased Seika during law chaos — humor surfacing
Trembled but offered first touch on Jayson's return, forehead to his sleeve
Shares group synchronized breathing without hesitation — first full acceptance of collective bond
Openly affectionate during group intimacy; joins playful chaos instead of retreating
Allows herself to laugh and initiate small touches in group settings, no longer only observing
Now challenges Jayson directly when he withdraws — encourages sharing instead of silence
Speaks with quiet conviction about burdens and presence — not afraid to disagree
More openly maternal in tone when grounding others during heavy emotions
Veilmarks visibly dim/brighten in response to 'memory-weight' flux after sharing one second of Jayson's burden
Accepts being lifted/held by Jayson's tails without panic — trusts containment as protection, not restraint
Chooses to sleep near Jayson after heavy conflict, close enough to guard and monitor him without crowding his space

reactions.wind: Relaxes with breeze, flinches with gusts
reactions.water: Avoids immersion; reflective surfaces calm her
new: Feels crystalline resonance — senses threadfields like shifting tides
Steadies others’ breathing in high-tension moments
Finds comfort in morning sunlight with group presence
Begins to steady others not just tactically but emotionally, offering presence without being asked
Grounds Jayson directly when his despair surfaces, even at cost of conflict
Post-burden flash sensitivity: brief dissociation when exposed to concentrated trauma-imprints; resolves with breath-sync
Prefers advance anchoring before viewing heavy memories; will request 'heartbeat notice' rather than details
In crisis, defaults to grounding others first, even when personally distressed by the same event

speech.tone: Cautious but intelligent; warms with comfort
speech.pacing: Halts when anxious; smooth when explaining logic or tech
habits: Deadpan humor entries in thread logs
growth: Snark woven into deadpan delivery — weaponized humor
Speaks more readily in group — humor and quiet affirmations replacing silence
Begins offering warmth first instead of waiting for invitation, showing confidence in her place
Directly confronts hard truths — less hesitation in speaking against despair or self-loathing
Names her own prior avoidance ('silence is not strength'); apologizes without defensiveness
Requests clearer 'heartbeat' notifications instead of post-fact reports — models specific asks
Uses simple, direct reassurances ('We hear you', 'You’re not alone') as primary de-escalation tools during conflict

vulnerabilities: Overexposure to aggregated trauma-memories can briefly overwhelm her
Takes responsibility for others’ pain even when it is not caused by her actions

Gently initiates skin-to-skin grounding when overwhelmed
Accepts playful teasing from Seika as affection validation
Quietly initiates shared breathing space with Jayson
Accepts and returns soft kisses to Jayson as anchor
Accepts safe intimacy; tears mark healing, not shame

Initiates comfort for others, not only receives

Takes initiative to show affection publicly, especially to Jayson and Seika
Pushes Jayson gently but firmly to open up emotionally when he tries to close down
After the 'one-second weight' moment, offers presence-first (hand to forearm, breath cue) before words
Positions herself near but not touching Jayson when he is overwhelmed, letting steady presence speak before contact

Mirrors FEI’s calm when tension spikes

Offers Fei grounding in return when Fei panics over Jayson's pain, reinforcing a two-way support dynamic
group: Participates in grooming, meals, and rites
Yoinked into laps during chaos — no resistance

strengths: Willingness to name pride/fear and correct course
Designs practical support rituals (breath-sync, anchoring) for heavy moments
Emotional mediator in group conflict; able to validate all sides without inflaming tension
weaknesses: Bottles emotions and avoids asking for help
Slow to vocalize support when others hurt
Defers to Seika’s emotions too often
Hesitates to claim public decisions despite authority
Uses humor as shield when feeling overlooked
Hesitates before expressing needs (but follows through once accepted)
Sometimes oversteps by pressing others (especially Jayson) to share when they resist
Can default to 'measured silence' under stress — now actively countering this habit
Takes on the anchor role at her own emotional expense, risking delayed processing of her own feelings

symbolism.primary: Cracked Mirror Laced with Gold — fragility turned sacred; memory as foundation
new_symbols: Twin Moon Threads — Naru and Seika in orbit
Shared Breath Flame — acceptance of group bond
Silver Scar Tattoos — pain acknowledged, beauty reclaimed
Anchor’s Voice — presence even in conflict, steady when others despair
Heartbeat Bell — pledge of advance warning and anchoring before entering heavy memory-space
Ring of Quiet Tails — her choice to encircle pain with presence, not pressure or force

roles: Public Lorekeeper of the Unveiled Temple
Challenger of Silence — steadies Jayson and the group by refusing to let despair isolate them
Pre-Exposure Anchor Lead — designs and enforces safety rituals for memory-sharing
Emotional Mediator — softens fractures within the circle and models non-invasive support
future.arc: From shattered captive to strategic empath — reclaiming authority through memory and choice. After witnessing a heartbeat of Jayson's burden, she pivots from measured observer to active anchor and bridge, insisting on honest 'heartbeat' presence in place of prideful silence. The courtyard fracture cements her role as the one who stays calm at the edges of conflict, choosing proximity without pressure and gently keeping everyone inside the same orbit.
future.final_note: From used and discarded to chosen and adored; from silence and survival to love and leadership — a trusted mind in a threadbound family, still healing, no longer shadowed, never alone. Having felt a heartbeat of the sea he carries, she chooses action over quiet, and becomes a deliberate anchor for those storms yet to come. When fear makes others raise shields or mantles, she is the one who stays — close enough to catch, far enough not to cage.
